provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: To Go Menu
items.description: Bring your own tumbler for a $0.25 Discount

items.name: Sandwiches
items.description: All Urth sandwiches are made on rustic bread, served with farm fresh-locally grown mixed greens salad and Urth balsamic vinaigrette. Salad may be substituted with fresh fruit for an additional $3. Pita, sourdough, whole wheat, ancient grain sprout, olive ciabatta, country white or Gluten free bread substitute available

items.name: Grilled Cilantro Chicken with Pesto
items.description: Cheese-free pesto is available

items.name: Herb Roasted Turkey Breast
items.description: Dijon mustard & mayonnaise

items.name: Tuna Sandwich
items.description: Celery, onion, cucumbers, tomato, olive oil, vinegar & mayo on bread

items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: All-natural chicken breast, raisins, onions, celery, in a curry sauce & mayo on bread

items.name: Grilled Veggie with Pesto
items.description: Eggplant, zucchini, mushroom & roasted peppers

items.name: Sprout Sandwich
items.description: Alfalfa sprouts, Jarlsberg Swiss cheese, red onion, Roma tomatoes, avocado & hummus on sprouted bread

items.name: Caprese Sandwich
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, roasted peppers, heirloom tomatoes and fresh basil served on a toasted baguette with basil oil, balsamic vinegar reduction and sundried tomato spread

items.name: The "New Yorker" Sandwich
items.description: A classic Rueben sandwich with all natural pastrami with Russian dressing, braised green cabbage, imported Swiss cheese on thick slices of marble bread grilled golden brown. Served with a locally grown mixed greens salad & cornichon pickles

items.name: Urth Pot Roast Sandwich
items.description: Slow roasted all natural beef with natural juices on a classic French baguette. Served with a locally grown mixed greens salad & homemade horseradish sauce

items.name: Turkey Burger
items.description: Fresh ground turkey (10 ounces) seasoned with herbs, sea salt, Worcestershire and tomato. Grilled well and served on a rustic roll with Dijon mustard, mayonnaise, lettuce and tomato. Served with a locally grown mixed greens salad

items.name: Margarita Pizza
items.description: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella and basil

items.name: Butternut Squash & Ricotta Pizza
items.description: Tomatoes, mozzarella and herbed Ricotta cheese, butternut squash and fresh oregano

items.name: Melanzane Pizza
items.description: House roasted eggplant, parmigiano reggiano, fresh basil, tomato sauce, castelvetrano olives and fresh mozzarella

items.name: Pizza Catona*
items.description: Tomatoes, mozzarella, burrata cheese, Prosciutto di Parma, basil and arugula

items.name: Sunrise Pizza*
items.description: Sausage, pancetta, mozzarella, potatoes, poached egg and brown sage butter

items.name: D'lox Pizza
items.description: Smoked salmon, herbed mascarpone, red onions, arugula, fennel & capers

items.name: Wild Mushroom Pizza
items.description: Sautéed wild mushrooms, braised balsamic onions, mozzarella, burrata and truffle pecorino cheeses. Garnished with wild arugula

items.name: Pizza Primavera
items.description: Vegan Monterey Jack cheese, Heirloom mix tomatoes, poached asparagus, Kalamata olives, grilled artichoke hearts on 100% vegan pizza crust

items.name: The Urth Salad
items.description: Our famous salad made with locally grown mixed greens, feta cheese, Roma tomatoes, hearts of palm, garbanzo beans, Kalamata olives (with pits) and pine nuts in Urth vinaigrette dressing. Served with fresh baked bread

items.name: Urth Farmer's Salad
items.description: Locally grown baby spinach salad with peppercorn dressing, grilled artichokes, tomatoes, French radishes, red onion, shaved fennel, glazed pecans and shaved parmesan cheese. Served with dried fruit, nut bread and butter

items.name: Nicoise Salad
items.description: House smoked salmon, live butter lettuce, haricot vert, potatoes, tomatoes, olives, shallots and a hard poached organic egg. Tossed in our tarragon lemon vinaigrette

items.name: Caravan Kale Salad
items.description: Organic Tuscan kale, organic red quinoa, Persian cucumbers, heirloom tomatoes, roasted yams, red onion, pita chips and fresh mint tossed in our pomegranate vinaigrette. Topped with ricotta salata cheese

items.name: The Greek Salad
items.description: Live butter lettuce and Treviso lettuce tossed with avocado, seedless cucumbers, feta, Kalamata olives (with pits) , tomatoes and Urth oregano vinaigrette. Served with pita bread

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Locally grown hearts of romaine, reggiano parmesan cheese, cheese chips and our delicious homemade Caesar dressing

items.name: Mixed Greens Salad
items.description: With balsamic vinaigrette dressing. Served with fresh baked bread

items.name: Fresh Fruit Plate
items.description: An array of the finest seasonal fruits served with cottage cheese or organic nonfat yogurt. Fruit is cut to order

items.name: Heirloom Tomato & Burrata Salad
items.description: Fresh burrata cheese, heirloom tomatoes and wild arugula tossed in a Urth vinaigrette. Garnished with basil oil and balsamic reduction

items.name: Entrée Salads
items.description: Made with locally grown mixed greens, Roma tomatoes, dressed with Urth balsamic vinaigrette. Served with fresh baked bread. Half - $9.75, Full - $12.25

items.name: Grilled Panini Sandwiches
items.description: Served with locally grown baby spinach, baby sugar plum tomatoes, candied pecans and a peppercorn vinaigrette garnished with marinated mixed olives (with pits). No substitutions

items.name: Panini Portabella
items.description: Grilled portabella mushrooms, roasted peppers, arugula, pesto goat cheese and grilled artichokes (completely vegan sandwich also available upon request)

items.name: Panini Caprese
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, roasted peppers, sundried tomato spread, fresh basil, pesto and olive spread

items.name: Panini Prosciutto Di Parma*
items.description: Prosciutto di Parma, Italian cheese, sundried tomato spread, porcini mushroom duxelle and fresh basil

items.name: Panini Roasted Turkey
items.description: Urth butter roasted turkey breast with Jarlsberg Swiss cheese. Served on plain or olive focaccia bread with whole grain mustard sauce

items.name: Panini El Diablo
items.description: Grilled cilantro marinated chicken breast, three chili sauce, thinly sliced jalapeno, micro cilantro and Monterey jack cheese

items.name: The Mediterranean Platter
items.description: A plate of feta cheese, grape leaves, hummus, tabouli, roasted peppers and mixed olives (with pits) , grilled artichokes and pure olive oil. Served with pita bread

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Fresh pasta with mushrooms, zucchini, eggplant and ricotta cheese. Served with locally grown mixed greens salad, fresh baked bread and butter

items.name: Urth Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled chicken or pot roast (also available: cheese, tuna, grilled veggies, or soy-cheese quesadilla) , Monterey jack cheese melted in a flour, spinach or wheat tortilla. Served with black beans, sour cream, guacamole and salsa. Chopped chilies on request

items.name: Urth Tamales
items.description: Your choice of green chilies and cheddar cheese, or chicken, tomatillo and green chilies. Served with locally grown mixed greens salad and a mild Chipotle sauce

items.name: The Tostada
items.description: A salad served in a fried tortilla shell with your choice of grilled chicken or veggies on a bed of black beans and romaine lettuce tossed in our lime cilantro vinaigrette. Garnished with salsa, guacamole, Monterey jack cheese and sour cream served on the side

items.name: Nori Plum Rice Wrap
items.description: Nori sheet stuffed with avocado, organic brown rice, carrots, broccoli, green onions, Umeboshi plum paste, and five spice tofu. Served with a locally grown mixed greens salad and wasabi

items.name: Soups Du Jour
items.description: Served with fresh baked bread and butter

items.name: The Combo Special #1
items.description: A bowl of soup or vegetarian chili and any Urth sandwich (excludes Caprese, New Yorker, Pot Roast and Turkey Burger) or entrée salad and bread

items.name: The Combo Special #2
items.description: Our Caesar Salad or Urth Salad with a bowl of soup or vegetarian chili

items.name: The Light Lunch Combo
items.description: Locally grown mixed greens salad with a bowl of soup or vegetarian chili. Served with fresh baked bread and butter

items.name: Smoked Salmon Plate
items.description: Our fresh 100% natural smoked salmon is served with a bagel, capers, chives, cream cheese, Roma tomatoes, romaine lettuce, red onions and fresh cracked black pepper

items.name: The Cheese Plate
items.description: The finest brie, Jarlsberg, Gouda, and French feta cheese served with a sliced baguette and dried fruit and nut bread. Garnished with sliced apples, seasonal grapes, Dijon mustard and fresh mint leaves, it's great for sharing!

items.name: The Egg Sandwich
items.description: Organic eggs with avocado, Monterey jack cheese, mild chilies, Roma tomatoes, lettuce and mayonnaise on a rustic roll. Served with locally grown mixed greens salad

items.name: Individual Quiche
items.description: $11.25. Served with locally grown mixed greens salad

items.name: Cheeses
items.description: Jarlsberg, Feta, Gouda, Brie

items.name: Sourdough Bread
items.description: Sold only with entrée

items.name: Kalamata Or Mixed Olives W/pits
items.description: Please be advised! Our olives contain pits

items.name: Urth Bread Pudding Breakfast
items.description: Warm bread pudding served with your choice of slow roasted apples or caramelized bananas with steamed milk.The best in L.A.!

items.name: Urth Granola™ Bowl
items.description: Oven roasted oats, almonds, sundried blueberries and cranberries with pumpkin and sunflower seeds sweetened with honey, spices and pure maple syrup. Served with your choice of milk

items.name: Urth Crunch Gluten Free Cereal
items.description: A delicious new gluten free, organic breakfast cereal made with organic puffed quinoa, organic puffed grains, flax seeds, pistachios, gogi berries and more. It's packed with antioxidants! Served with your choice of milk

items.name: Organic Oatmeal
items.description: Served piping hot with organic raisins, Urth granola and brown sugar with your choice of milk

items.name: Apple Raisin Oatmeal
items.description: Our organic oatmeal topped with slow roasted apples in all their juices with organic raisins. Served with granola and your choice of milk

items.name: Banana Nut Oatmeal
items.description: Our organic oatmeal topped with cooked bananas in a light caramel sauce and sprinkled with toasted walnut pieces. Served with granola and your choice of milk

items.name: Yogurt Bowl
items.description: Low fat plain organic yogurt with a side of Urth granola

items.name: Berry Bowl
items.description: Fresh seasonal berries such as blueberries, blackberries, raspberries and strawberries. Served with whipped cream, yogurt or cottage cheese

items.name: Fresh Grapefruit Bowl
items.description: Fresh seasonal white or ruby red grapefruit segments. Served with whipped cream, organic yogurt or cottage cheese

items.name: Egg Dishes
items.description: Our egg dishes are prepared with organic eggs from cage-free, vegetarian fed chickens

items.name: Poach Di Parma*
items.description: Toasted ancient grain ciabatta, garlic truffle aioli, sautéed wild mushrooms, Prosciutto di Parma topped with soft poached eggs, wild arugula, reggiano parmesan and sage butter. Served with sliced seasonal melon

items.name: Eggs Salmone
items.description: Toasted ancient grain sprout bread, lemon mascarpone, natural smoked salmon and wild arugula, topped with two soft poached eggs, chopped salsa verde and fresh dill. Served with sliced seasonal melon

items.name: Natural Beef Hash
items.description: Heirloom potatoes, bell peppers, onions and parsley topped with two organic poached eggs, slowly braised short rib, chopped tomato, basil pesto and reggiano parmesan cheese

items.name: The Rustic Poached
items.description: Two poached organic eggs over toasted whole wheat bread garnished with capers, basil oil, heirloom tomato and red onion

items.name: Eggs Verde
items.description: Two poached organic eggs over a bed of wild arugula, roasted corn, baby tomatoes and poached asparagus spears tossed with peppercorn dressing. Garnished with cracked black pepper, basil oil and reggiano parmesan cheese

items.name: Omelets & Scrambles
items.description: Served with Fresh Baked Bread and a Locally Grown Mixed Greens Salad. Substitute Tofu or Egg Whites, Add $1.50. Substitute Fresh Fruit for the Salad, $3

items.name: The Italian Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs, mild chicken basil sausage, roasted peppers, Roma tomatoes, fresh basil and mozzarella

items.name: The Mexican Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs, Roma tomatoes, green chilies, red onions, Monterey jack cheese and cilantro. Served with fresh salsa

items.name: The Mushroom Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs with fresh mushrooms, Roma tomatoes, red onions and Monterey jack cheese. Served with fresh salsa

items.name: The Grilled Vegetable Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs with grilled zucchini, eggplant, mushrooms and roasted red peppers sprinkled with parmesan cheese

items.name: The Spinach & Feta Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs with sautéed spinach, red onions and imported feta cheese

items.name: The Sausage & Potato Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs with spicy chicken sausage, heirloom potatoes, bell peppers, onions and chopped parsley

items.name: The Chicken Pesto Omelet
items.description: Three organic eggs with grilled chicken, pesto, mozzarella and goat cheeses

items.name: The Salmon Scramble
items.description: Three organic eggs with our natural smoked salmon, Roma tomatoes and chives

items.name: The Scramble
items.description: Three organic eggs served with locally grown mixed greens salad dressed with Urth vinaigrette. Served with salsa and fresh baked bread

items.name: Classic Belgian Waffle
items.description: Old-fashioned Belgian buttermilk waffle. Served with pure maple syrup and butter

items.name: Multi-Grain Waffle
items.description: Multi-grain waffle made with apple sauce, buttermilk, oats, flax seed, wheat germ and whole wheat flour. Served with pure maple syrup and butter

items.name: The Urth Parfait
items.description: A layered parfait of Urth granola and organic low fat yogurt with fresh orange and mint seasonal berry Ambrosia

items.name: The Cottage Parfait
items.description: Our organic puffed gluten free granola layered with organic Greek yogurt, strawberry jam, mixed berries and seasonal fruit

items.name: The Urth Breakfast
items.description: Fresh baked bread or butter croissant with your choice of brie, Jarlsberg, feta or Gouda, butter and jam

items.name: Breakfast Burrito*
items.description: Choice of flour, spinach or wheat tortilla with organic scrambled eggs, organic black beans, Monterey jack cheese, guacamole and salsa. Served with a mild Chipotle sauce

items.name: Prosciutto & Cheese Breakfast Panini*
items.description: Organic eggs, Prosciutto di Parma, roasted peppers and mozzarella cheese grilled on country bread. Served with mild tomato dipping sauce

items.name: Egg White & Spinach Breakfast Panini
items.description: Egg whites, sautéed spinach and mozzarella cheese grilled on wheat bread. Served with mild tomato dipping sauce

items.name: Toasted Bagel
items.description: Plain, seeded or onion

items.name: Breads
items.description: Toasted rustic roll, baguette, sprouted bread, sourdough, whole wheat or Gluten free bread

items.name: Brioche Breakfast
items.description: Fresh baked Urth Brioche. Served with butter, jam and cream cheese

items.name: Famous Pecan Sticky Buns
items.description: "Addictive" is a word that has been used to describe our sticky buns by our customers and critics alike. This is an Urth must try!

items.name: Assorted Bread Pudding
items.description: Made from our own brioche baked in custard. Your choice of plain or cinnamon raisin

items.name: Muffins & Non Fat Muffins
items.description: Blueberry, Chocolate, Banana Poppy, Green Tea, Raisin Bran, Pumpkin, Cranberry, Zucchini, Non Fat Blueberry, Non Fat Banana, and Gluten Free Seasonal Fruit muffin

items.name: Scones
items.description: Blueberry, Citrus Ginger, Chocolate Espresso, Dried Fruit Nut and White Chocolate Pecan

items.name: Cream Cheese, Cottage Cheese, Urth Jams
Pure Maple Syrup, Organic Peanut Butter, Organic Yogurt Or Fresh Salsa
Cheeses
items.description: Jarlsberg, Feta, Gouda, Brie

items.name: Sourdough Bread
items.description: W/purchase

items.name: All Natural Mild Or Spicy Sausage
Urth Exquisite Cakes
items.description: We bake our cakes each day, using only the finest natural and organic ingredients such as imported chocolate, fresh cream, organic fresh eggs and European style butter. $6.75 per Slice

items.name: Famous Cheesecakes
items.description: Unbelievably rich and creamy-our cheesecakes are known as the very best in Los Angeles. $6.75 per Slice

items.name: Old-Fashioned Pies
items.description: Our pies are baked fresh everyday. $6.75 per Slice

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: With Whipped Cream

items.name: Coconut Custard Pie
items.description: With Whipped Cream

items.description: $5.25 per Slice

items.name: Urth Tiramisú
items.description: $6.75 each

items.name: Fresh Baked Classic Cookies
items.description: $2.50 each

items.name: Urth Vegan Desserts
items.description: Egg & Dairy Free

items.name: Vegan Chocolate Cake
items.description: Our vegan chocolate cake contains absolutely no dairy, eggs, or animal products of any kind

items.name: Victory Vegan Pumpkin Pie
items.description: Gluten free crust filled with pumpkin filling

items.name: Urth Fruit Tarts
items.description: Glazed seasonal fruits on top of vanilla pastry creme, in a pastry tart (contains almonds)

items.name: Bavarian Fruit Tart
items.description: Puff pastry tart filled with Bavarian pastry cream and topped with fresh fruit (contains almonds)

items.name: Urth Napoleon
items.description: Our secret recipe pastry cream in housemade puff pastry and caramelized sugar. Chocolate Napoleons are available on the weekends

items.name: Tre Latti
items.description: Vanilla sponge cake soaked in 4 different sweet milks, a layer of Chantilly cream and iced with a caramelized meringue

items.name: Pompeii Cream Puff
items.description: Puff pastry shell filled with salted caramel and vanilla pastry cream

items.name: Espresso Drinks
items.description: Your choice of: Urth Italia™ - Dark Roast, Urth Dolcé™ - Light Roast

items.name: Espresso Macchiato
items.description: Our espresso with a dollop of steamed milk

items.name: Caffé Bebero
items.description: A short espresso layered with sweetened condensed milk

items.name: Green Or Red Tea Espresso
items.description: Made with organic Wazuka matcha green tea or rooibos tea

items.name: Green Or Red Tea Bebero
items.description: Made with organic Wazuka matcha green tea or rooibos tea espresso layered with sweetened condensed milk

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso capped high with lots of foamy milk

items.name: Italian Cappuccino™
items.description: Authentic Italian cappuccino prepared by carefully folding thick, creamy frothed milk into espresso - highly recommended

items.name: Gran Caffé Cappuccino
items.description: A special Roman cappuccino with sugar & spice infused espresso

items.name: Caffé Latté
items.description: Some say ours is the best in the world

items.name: Spanish Latté™
items.description: A sweet, creamy cafe latté inspired by coffee in Barcelona

items.name: Honey Vanilla Latté
items.description: Natural vanilla, a touch of honey, espresso and steamed milk

items.name: Caffé Mocha
items.description: Rich, hot cocoa poured over espresso

items.name: Mocha Mint
items.description: Mint flavor, whip cream with mint chocolate shavings

items.name: Caffé Quadra™
items.description: Extra strong cafe latté prepared with many ristretto espresso shots

items.name: Rude Awakening
items.description: Our famous dark Manhattan Mudd™coffee with espresso poured on top!

items.name: Caffé Breve
items.description: Espresso drink prepared with half n half

items.name: Organic Milk
items.description: With natural vanilla, sugar free vanilla, gingerbread, hazelnut, almond, caramel, coconut, banana, mango or mint flavor add $0.65

items.name: Extras
items.description: Drinks can be made unsweetened upon request

items.name: 100% Natural Flavors to Any Drink
items.description: Vanilla, sugar free vanilla, gingerbread, hazelnut, almond, caramel, coconut, banana, mango or mint (add $0.65 ea)

items.name: Add Boba Tapioca Pearls to Any Blended Drink
Substitute Almond, Rice Or Soy Milk in Any Drink
Substitute Coconut Milk
items.description: Add $1

items.name: Prepare Any Drink with Certified Organic Milk Or Steamed Milk
Blended Ice Drinks
items.description: Made individually to order. No hydrogenated oil, artificial flavors or preservatives. Most can be made sugar free

items.name: Spanish Latté™ Granita
items.description: Our most famous blended ice drink-creamy and sweet

items.name: Caffé Granita
items.description: Blended ice cappuccino with creamy vanilla

items.name: Caffé Mocha Granita
items.description: Blended ice mocha with rich chocolate and organic espresso

items.name: Caffé Glacé
items.description: House made vanilla milkshake drenched with organic espresso

items.name: Monkey Granita™
items.description: Organic espresso, organic matcha green tea or organic Rooibos with fresh banana milkshake

items.name: Milkshake
items.description: Chocolate or Vanilla

items.name: Hot Tea to Go
items.description: Choose from our world class, hand-picked estate teas- black, oolong, green and certified organic herbal infusions

items.name: Green Tea Americano
items.description: Made with organic Wazuka green tea

items.name: African Tea Latté
items.description: Organic Rooibos tea with traditional African spices

items.name: Divine Spice™chai Latté
items.description: Our own malty herbal chai latté prepared with steamed milk & honey in the Indian tradition-naturally caffeine free!

items.name: English Tea Latté
items.description: A rich creamy organic tea latte, perfect for high tea!

items.name: Japanese Tea Latté
items.description: Made with organic matcha green tea

items.name: Moroccan Tea Latté
items.description: Made with organic green tea and cool creamy mint

items.name: Thai Red Tea Latté
items.description: A creamy Thai style latté with organic Rooibos

items.name: Urth Iced Tea
items.description: Half tea, half lemonade

items.name: Urth Bobas
items.description: Exotic ice tea cocktails blended or shaken to order. Made with organic tea, natural flavors, milk and tapioca pearls. Milk: Soy, rice, almond or organic milk substitutions available for an additional charge

items.name: Organic Green Tea Boba
items.description: Available with natural vanilla, sugar free vanilla, gingerbread, hazelnut, almond, caramel, coconut, banana, mango or mint flavor

items.name: Organic Black Tea Boba
items.description: Available with natural vanilla, sugar free vanilla, gingerbread, hazelnut, almond, caramel, coconut, banana, mango or mint flavor

items.name: Organic Earl Grey Tea Boba
items.description: Available with natural vanilla, sugar free vanilla, gingerbread, hazelnut, almond, caramel, coconut, banana, mango or mint flavor

items.name: Fresh Juice Bar
items.description: Fresh squeezed from seasonal fruits delivered daily orange, apple, grapefruit, carrot, celery, beet and ginger

items.name: Mixed Veggie Juice
items.description: Carrot, beet, celery and ginger

items.name: Smoothies
items.description: Choose from fresh seasonal fruits of the day such as strawberries, bananas, kiwis, pineapple and mango. Please ask for availability

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: Naturally delicious. Sorry, no refills
